name: Favorite GIF Search
description: Adds search to your favorited GIFs!
author: xirreal

site.longDescription: Losing a battle of wits? The conversation needs a deranged GIF but you have too many to choose from? Never fail to find the perfect GIF again! Right click a favorited image to add tags to it, then just search for it using the search bar in the favorited GIFs menu.
